Class Conversion

java.lang.Object
Conversion
public class Conversion extends Object
This class converts Philippine pesos to USD and viceversa
Since:
03/02/2023
Author:
Matt Magnaye and Pedro Orellana

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Conversion()
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    displayConversion(int option)
    This method takes option previously selected by the user, then gets a currency value (either in Pesos or USD) and calls the appropriate method to make the conversion
    static double
    dollarToPeso(double dollar)
    This method takes a value in USD and returns its equivalent in Philippine pesos

    Starting point of the program

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Starting point of the program
      Parameters:
      args - command line arguments

    • showMenu

      public static int showMenu()
      This method displays a menu of options to the user, gets an input and returns it to the main method so that it can be further processed
      Returns:
      option selected by user

    • displayConversion

      public static void displayConversion(int option)
      This method takes option previously selected by the user, then gets a currency value (either in Pesos or USD) and calls the appropriate method to make the conversion
      Parameters:
      option - user-selected option to select what the program does. Valid options are 1, 2 or 3. Any other value makes the menu to reprint to the screen.

    • returnToMainMenuOrExit

      public static void returnToMainMenuOrExit()
      This method shows after a conversion has executed. It gives the user the option to make another conversion or exit the program. Valid options are 1 and 2. Any other value will make the menu to reprint on the screen.

    • pesoToDollar

      public static double pesoToDollar(double peso)
      This method takes a value in Philippine pesos and returns its equivalent in USD
      Parameters:
      peso - currency value in Philippine pesos
      Returns:
      currency value converted to USD

    • dollarToPeso

      public static double dollarToPeso(double dollar)
      This method takes a value in USD and returns its equivalent in Philippine pesos
      Parameters:
      dollar - currency value in USD
      Returns:
      currency value converted to Philippine pesos
